title: Font critique: Theory Serif
content:
Yesterday I posted an introduction to my new typeface I’m working on, Theory Serif: [http://typophile.com/node/107663](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414095514/http:/typophile.com/node/107663 "http://typophile.com/node/107663")

Your thoughts, critique and ideas are welcome.
author: Core0
